member.name: APPX_BUNDLE_FOOTPRINT_FILE_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of footprint file in a bundle.

member.name: APPX_BUNDLE_FOOTPRINT_FILE_TYPE.APPX_BUNDLE_FOOTPRINT_FILE_TYPE_FIRST
member.summary: The bundle's first footprint file, which is the bundle manifest.

member.name: APPX_BUNDLE_FOOTPRINT_FILE_TYPE.APPX_BUNDLE_FOOTPRINT_FILE_TYPE_LAST
member.summary: The bundle's last footprint file, which is the bundle signature.
